title: heightmap test failure on ati gpu

content.raw:
[heightmap test failed](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-gazebo_1.3-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/lastCompletedBuild/consoleText)

with context
~~~
test 7
      Start  7: heightmap

7: Test command: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-gazebo_1.3-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/build/test/regression/heightmap "--gtest_output=xml:/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-gazebo_1.3-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/build/test_results/heightmap.xml"

7: [1;31mError [heightmap.cc:41][0m No rendering engine, unable to run heights test

7: [ RUN      ] HeightmapTest.WhiteAlpha
7: Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.3.1

7: [1;33mWarning [RenderEngine.cc:88][0m Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
 7/30 Test  #7: heightmap ........................***Exception: SegFault  7.73 sec
